title: How to Be Good at Blood Gulch in Halo PC

steps.headline: Take out a pistol and a sniper.
Take the pistol and aim just a tad in front of where the enemy is moving
If they move to the right, aim more right than were they are now.
steps.description: Aim a little up to ensure headshots.

steps.headline: If they jump, it will be a lot harder to hit them.
steps.description: there isn't really a trick to hitting bouncy noobs, so just keep your cool if you can't hit them. The BEST way to hit a bouncy maniac is to either have a shotgun, or an assault rifle handy as the shots spread.

steps.headline: Hide in the caves or bases to surprise enemies.
steps.description: In that area, the shotgun would work well.

steps.headline: Fight vehicles.
steps.description: The rocket launcher works for warthogs, pistol, shotgun, or plasma rifle for banshees.
